1: <pb/><t>Ix yalanxi vin̈aj Job chi' icha tic:</t>
2: <t>Yipc'olal ix colvaj a lolonel ix al d'ayin d'a in cusc'olal tic, yuj am to tzila' to man̈xalaj vip.</t>
3: <t>Vach' jun, syal ac'an in razón, tzin a c'ayb'an a in malaj in pensar tic.</t>
4: <t>¿Mach ix lolon d'a a pensar yuj chi' tzala'? ¿Mach ix alan d'ayach, yuj chi' tzal icha chi'?</t>
5: <t>A eb' chamnac ayec' d'a sjulal yich a' mar, tz'ib'xi eb' yuj xivelal.</t>
6: <t>A b'aj ayec' eb' chamnac, chequel yaj d'a yichan̈ Dios, chequel yaj junjun eb' d'a yichan̈.</t>
7: <t>A ix jen̈b'anb'at satchaan̈ d'a stojolal norte b'aj jacan, malaj tas d'ay. Ix sb'oanoch lum luum b'aj malaj tasi.</t>
8: <t>A tz'ac'anb'at a a' d'a scal asun, palta max n̈ic'chajlaj asun chi' yuj yalil a'.</t>
9: <t>A tz'ac'an q'uic'b'oquel sat q'uen uj, vach'chom c'ojan q'ueen, palta a' tz'ac'anoch asun d'a sat q'ueen.</t>
10: <t>A ix ac'anem yechel d'a yib'an̈ a' mar b'aj sc'och c'aman saquilq'uinal yed' q'uic'alq'uinal.</t>
11: <t>A yipumal satchaan̈ tz'ib'xi, xivpaxq'uei ayic stumvaj Dios chi'.</t>
12: <t>A yuj spoder ix scachanoch vaan a' mar, yuj sjelanil ix yac'an ganar noc' nivan Rahab.</t>
13: <t>Jun pusn̈ej syac'a' sc'achvi, a yed' spoder stecancham noc' chan mecan cuman sb'ati.</t>
14: <t>A jantac tas satub'tac sc'ulej ix cab' tic, jab'n̈ej. A tas ix cab' tic ton̈ej ix co mac ab'ej. Ocxom val to tz'acan tz'aj cab'ani, maxtzac am nachajel cuuj, xchi vin̈aj Job chi'.</t>
